summary: The BuildRequest only asks to display "Mobile: 9973279335" in the global footer on all pages. The diff summary suggests App.tsx was modified and mentions the footer in a generated summary file, but the provided truncated App.tsx snippet does not show any footer JSX or the exact required text, so implementation of REQ-2 cannot be verified from the included evidence. Additionally, App.tsx appears to include (or adds) admin order toast notification behavior and a Phone icon import, which are not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the mobile number "9973279335" at the bottom of the app by displaying it in the global footer (below the main content) in English, showing exactly "Mobile: 9973279335" on all pages/states.
missing_requirements.reason: The only code shown for frontend/src/App.tsx is truncated before any footer markup; there is no visible JSX proving that a global footer exists/was modified to include the exact text "Mobile: 9973279335" across all app states. The separate frontend-file-summaries.txt claims it exists, but that is not the actual component implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin new-order toast notifications (same-tab detection via state changes and cross-tab detection via storage events).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly focuses only on displaying a phone number in the footer and has non-goals around adding extra functionality beyond displaying the number.
Not requested by REQ-2; only the text "Mobile: 9973279335" is required.

hallucinated_features.description: Updating project tracking metadata (project_state.json) to add/track feature request items AR-1/AR-2 as pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the functional requirement to render the number in the footer; the BuildRequest does not request project state bookkeeping changes.
